title: India emerges as world’s services factory: Goldman Sachs report
selftext:
India emerges as world’s services factory:  Goldman Sachs report

 https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-emerges-as-worlds-services-factory-report/articleshow/109707130.cms
comments: What it should say is global developers hub. A software giant we can be with the amount of expertise here but fk this government and their one man god propaganda, can grow in a scenario like this.
Yeah cuz Sanghi Murthy wants people to work 70 hours. No innovation nothing. Just making broken apps for govt and foreign companies and taking pride in that? No thank you.
